resources.string:
During game stage 'Day' in order to select player, press on the list. You can vote only once during the game stage. Voted player is the last one you touch during the game stage. 

 During the game stage 'Night' only mafia and special roles can vote, civilians can still press on the screen to hide their identity, but their vote won't change anything. 

 Winner is determined, when civilians/mafia has no alive members left.
